data.oai_dc:dc: MBNMS/PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Big Creek, California, USA (BIG001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Big Creek, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a StowAway Tidbit Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. TBIC32+4+27) beginning 2006-10-05. The instrument depth was 004 meters, in an overall water depth of 26 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
